titles.title: INSTRUCT Act of 2025
INSTRUCT Act of 2025
Instructing Noteworthy Steps toward Transparency to Rout and Undo Calamitous Transactions Act of 2025
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require additional information in disclosures of foreign gifts and contracts from foreign sources.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Workforce.
